items.title: Record January 25 Buyback Transaction in Roadmap ðŸš€
items.summary: This update adds a new buyback transaction entry for January 25, 2026, to the roadmap feed, reflecting a transaction amount of $196.25 USD. The entry has been recorded in the `config/buyback-history.json` file, although the `ace_bought` value is currently set to 0 pending updates from on-chain data due to connectivity issues with Solscan. The transaction details are now available for verification.

items.title: Completed Solana X402 Payment Integration in Roadmap ðŸš€
items.summary: The Solana X402 payment integration task has been marked as completed, with a completion date set for January 26, 2026. The status in the roadmap has been updated from 'in_progress' to 'done', reflecting this significant milestone. This change will help streamline future payment processes and enhance overall project efficiency.
